      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String dbName,
                 java.lang.Integer MaximumRowsCountinPage)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize a new database with the specified and maximum number of records per page. If the database already exists, this method will reset it.
        Parameters:
        dbName - the name of the database
        MaximumRowsCountinPage - maximum number of records per table page
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred

      • use

        public void use(java.lang.String dbName)
         throws sagSolheeriman.DBEngineException,
                java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                java.io.IOException
        Switch to the database with the specified name
        Parameters:
        dbName - the name of the database to be used
        Throws:
        sagSolheeriman.DBEngineException - If the database with the specified name does not exist
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If there is an error with an existing database directory

      • addProperty

        public void addProperty(java.lang.String key,
                        java.lang.String value)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Add a new property to the database (added to config file)
        Parameters:
        key - the property to be added
        value - the value of the property
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If there is an error in the config file
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred

      • createTable

        public void createTable(java.lang.String strTableName,
                        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> htblColNameType,
                        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> htblColNameRefs,
                        java.lang.String strKeyColName)
                 throws sagSolheeriman.DBEngineException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Creates a new table with the specified name, columns and referential integrity constraints.
        Parameters:
        strTableName - the name of the table to be created
        htblColNameType - the types of all table columns
        htblColNameRefs - the references of the foreign key columns
        strKeyColName - the primary key of the table (only one column)
        Throws:
        sagSolheeriman.DBEngineException - If the name, column types or foreign keys are not valid
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred

                 throws sagSolheeriman.DBEngineException

        sagSolheeriman.DBEngineException

      • insertIntoTable

        public void insertIntoTable(java.lang.String strTableName,
                            java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> htblColNameValue)
                     throws sagSolheeriman.DBEngineException,
                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Insert a new record into the specified table
        Parameters:
        strTableName - the table to insert a record into.
        htblColNameValue - the record column name-value pairs
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If an error occurred in the stored table pages format
        sagSolheeriman.DBEngineException - if the table does not exist or the insertion failed

      • selectFromTable

        public java.util.Iterator<Record> selectFromTable(java.lang.String strTableName,
                                                  java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> htblColNameValue,
                                                  java.lang.String strOperator)
                                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                  java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                  java.io.IOException,
                                                  sagSolheeriman.DBEngineException
        Select all records from the table that matches the specified column name-value pairs with a given conditional operator (AND or OR)
        Parameters:
        strTableName - the name of the table to select from
        htblColNameValue - the column name-value pairs to which records will be compared
        strOperator - the conditional operator to be exectuted ("AND, "OR" only)
        Returns:
        an iterator pointing to the first record in the result set
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If an error occurred in the stored table file
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If an error occurred in the stored table pages format
        sagSolheeriman.DBEngineException - if the table does not exist

      • printResult

        public void printResult(java.util.Iterator<Record> itr,
                        java.lang.String strTableName)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Print the result set of a select query
        Parameters:
        itr - the iterator that points to the first record in the result set
        strTableName - the table name from which the result set is selected
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If an error occurred in the stored table file
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If an error occurred in the stored table file
